definition: the process of seeping, release (a liquid) in drops or small quantities
details:
noun
- the process of seeping
= synonyms: oozing
- any thick, viscous matter
= synonyms: goop
verb
- release (a liquid) in drops or small quantities
= synonyms: exudate, exude, transude, ooze out
- pass gradually or leak through or as if through small openings
= synonyms: seep
